text: Ate dharati upara naure-nere vakhare-vakhare ku-bhaga hana. Aguram de baga te kheta hana, khajuram hana. Inham vicom kujha ikale hana ate kujha duhare. Sare iko hi pani nala sije jande hana. Asim ika nu duje upara upaja vica utamata bakhasade ham, besaka inham cizam vica unham lokam la'i nisani'am hana, jihare citana karana
